import React ,{ Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Card, Button, CardTitle, CardText, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import classnames from 'classnames'; class DescripcionComentario extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ activeTab: '1', detalle: this.props.descripcion } console.log(this.props.descripcion) this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); } toggle(tab) { if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab }); } } render(){ return( //-- Product tab -->
{ this.toggle('1'); }}> Detalles { this.toggle('2'); }}> Comentarios
